page.title: 07A Day In The Life of Emma
page.content: At 8.00am I get up,and get dressed. The next job doesn't take long and that's getting washed.Having breakfast is my most favourite thing in the morning. Then I set off for school at 8.45am approx.so that I have time to play.At 9.00am, the teacher on duty calls us into school from the playground. Next we read until 9.30 then it is assembly. At 10.00am we begin maths. By the time 10.30 comes everyone is ready for break.When we come in the teacher is ready for creative English. After that group reading until 12.00 then yipee it's dinner time! After dinner, art and craft we made clay figures. At break we played "elastics". After play all the class played rounders until home time.When I got home I went to Church then I had tea at 6.30pm and I went to bed at 8.45pm.
